definitions.definition: Any of several plants of Plantago subg. Psyllium .
The seed husk of such plants , especially as a commercial dietary supplement used for mucilage and as a mild laxative .

main_definition: Any of several plants of Plantago subg. Psyllium .
secondary_definitions: The seed husk of such plants , especially as a commercial dietary supplement used for mucilage and as a mild laxative .
